remarks: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.)  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2011.)
statement:
ralrimivva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ps ) $.
ralrimivva $p |- ( ph -> A. x e. A A. y e. B ps ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph x y $.
